radiographic_examinations.findings: Aortic root dilation at the aortic sinus of 13 mm (Z score +3) without aortic insufficiency. Patent foramen ovale and ductus arteriosus with hemodynamically not significant left-to-right shunt.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up echocardiography at 5 months showed aortic dilation progressing to 18 mm; evaluation at 7 months showed aortic dilation stabilizing at 20 mm; latest evaluation at 13 months showed dilation progressing to 24.5 mm.

radiographic_examinations.findings: A planned examination to identify the presence of other aneurysms throughout the aorta and arterial tree.
